パッケージ org.thinkit.api.gateway.github.util

クラス UrlResolver

java.lang.Object
org.thinkit.api.gateway.github.util.UrlResolver
public final class UrlResolver
extends Object
The class that provides the URL generation process.

It provides methods for several patterns in generating URLs. For example, if you do not need to bind specific information to the API URL or specify a query string, you can simply call createUrl(GithubApi) to get the URL object for calling the API.

If you need to bind specific information to an API URL, call createUrl(GithubApi, List) , or if you need to specify a query string for an API URL, call createUrl(GithubApi, Map) . If you want to bind specific information to the URL and also specify a query string, call createUrl(GithubApi, Map, List) .

導入されたバージョン:
1.0.0

  • メソッドの概要

    修飾子とタイプ メソッド 説明
    static com.google.api.client.http.GenericUrl createUrl​(@NonNull GithubApi githubApi)
    Returns an API URL object based on the Enum element of GithubApi passed as an argument.
    static com.google.api.client.http.GenericUrl createUrl​(@NonNull GithubApi githubApi, @NonNull List<String> binds)
    Returns an API URL object based on the Enum element of GithubApi and bind data passed as arguments.
    static com.google.api.client.http.GenericUrl createUrl​(@NonNull GithubApi githubApi, @NonNull Map<QueryKey,​Object> queries)
    Returns an API URL object based on the Enum element of GithubApi and query data passed as arguments.
    static com.google.api.client.http.GenericUrl createUrl​(@NonNull GithubApi githubApi, @NonNull Map<QueryKey,​Object> queries, @NonNull List<String> binds)
    Returns an API URL object based on the Enum element of GithubApi and query data and bind data passed as arguments.

  • メソッドの詳細

    • createUrl

      public static com.google.api.client.http.GenericUrl createUrl​(@NonNull @NonNull GithubApi githubApi)
      Returns an API URL object based on the Enum element of GithubApi passed as an argument.
      パラメータ:
      githubApi - The GitHub API
      戻り値:
      The API URL
      例外:
      NullPointerException - If null is passed as an argument

    • createUrl

      public static com.google.api.client.http.GenericUrl createUrl​(@NonNull @NonNull GithubApi githubApi, @NonNull @NonNull List<String> binds)
      Returns an API URL object based on the Enum element of GithubApi and bind data passed as arguments.

      The bind data passed as an argument will be replaced with the string defined as "%s" in the API URL using String.format(String, Object...) .

      パラメータ:
      githubApi - The GitHub API
      binds - The bind data
      戻り値:
      The API URL
      例外:
      NullPointerException - If null is passed as an argument

    • createUrl

      public static com.google.api.client.http.GenericUrl createUrl​(@NonNull @NonNull GithubApi githubApi, @NonNull @NonNull Map<QueryKey,​Object> queries)
      Returns an API URL object based on the Enum element of GithubApi and query data passed as arguments.

      The query data defined in the Map will be generated in the format ?key1=value1&key2=value2&... .

      パラメータ:
      githubApi - The GitHub API
      queries - The query data
      戻り値:
      The API URL
      例外:
      NullPointerException - If null is passed as an argument

    • createUrl

      public static com.google.api.client.http.GenericUrl createUrl​(@NonNull @NonNull GithubApi githubApi, @NonNull @NonNull Map<QueryKey,​Object> queries, @NonNull @NonNull List<String> binds)
      Returns an API URL object based on the Enum element of GithubApi and query data and bind data passed as arguments.

      The query data defined in the Map will be generated in the format ?key1=value1&key2=value2&... .

      The bind data passed as an argument will be replaced with the string defined as "%s" in the API URL using String.format(String, Object...) .

      パラメータ:
      githubApi - The GitHub API
      queries - The query data
      binds - The bind data
      戻り値:
      The API URL
      例外:
      NullPointerException - If null is passed as an argument
